task.title: Managing meetings
task.shortdesc: You can join, start, pin, copy, edit, and remove meetings from your meeting list.

context.p:
When you tap Meetings from the main menu, a list of meetings that you own and attended opens. They are listed under one of the following tabs:
My Meetings List of meetings that you own.
Scheduled List of scheduled meetings that are on your calendar.
Pinned List of list of meetings that you pinned, which is the same as marking them as a favorite.
Recent List of recent meetings that you joined.
You can also join or start a meeting from this screen. See .

From the Meetings screen, you can manage meetings that are listed. Tap the meeting menu icon () to the right of each meeting to access the following tasks. Not all tasks are available for all meetings.
Pin You can make a meeting a favorite by pinning it. Meetings that you use frequently are a good candidates to be pinned. When you tap the meeting icon in a chat, the list of pinned meetings opens. With pinned meetings, you can easily send a meeting URL to chat partners.
Copy Copy a meeting link to the clipboard.
Edit Change meeting settings with the exception of the meeting name. You can't change the meeting name. For descriptions of settings, see .
Delete To remove a meeting, tap the remove icon.
Meeting Recordings View recordings for a meeting. laying recordings on your mobile device might incur additional fees to your mobile network plan. Recordings are available only for recently recorded , and they are available for a limited time.
Meeting Reports View reports about the meeting. Select the type of report to view or download. See for information about the meeting types and generating reports. Reports are available only for recent meetings.
